capabilities.name: Inspire Direction and Purpose
capabilities.description: Communicates goals, priorities, and vision to guide and motivate the communications team.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Requires exceptional communication skills for developing and delivering strategic communications and engaging with senior stakeholders.

capabilities.name: Influence and Negotiate
capabilities.description: Essential for coordinating with executives and managing stakeholder relationships.

capabilities.name: Manage Reform and Change
capabilities.description: Leads teams through operational change and navigates sensitive political matters.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Critical for developing communication strategies that address complex policy and regulatory issues.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Necessary for strategic planning and delivery of communications that support organizational priorities.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Responsible for ensuring communications align with NSW Government priorities and standards.

capabilities.name: Act with Integrity
capabilities.description: Upholds ethical standards and public sector values in all communications.

capabilities.name: Manage and Develop People
capabilities.description: Leads and motivates the communications team, developing their capabilities.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Oversees campaigns, announcements, and communication activities.

capabilities.name: Technology
capabilities.description: Manages digital content governance and online presence.

skills.name: Strategic Communications
skills.description: Developing and implementing communication strategies to support service delivery and reform.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.description: Providing high-level leadership and direction to the communications team.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: Establishing and driving positive relationships with internal and external stakeholders.

skills.name: Digital Content Management
skills.description: Overseeing website strategy and ensuring digital content is user-centered and aligned with strategic priorities.

skills.name: Brand Management
skills.description: Managing brand, content strategy, and social media presence.

generalRole.title: Director of Corporate Communications
generalRole.description: This role involves leading the strategic direction, planning, and delivery of communications to support organizational priorities, managing stakeholder engagement, and overseeing digital content and brand management.
